review.title: “Great small firm”
review.pros: Pros – Very diverse practise. Opportunuty to experience many different kinds of businesses. Challenging accounting problems. Flexible working arrangements. Nice people in general.
review.cons: Cons – Mostly women employees....some catty-ness. Boss is frequently impatient and can say things I'm sure he later regrets. Compared to other public accounting firms this one is much better on this score.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Be more patient with new employees. Assign more senior employees to train rather than trying yourself. You're no good at it.
